Perceptor:

Perceptor felt hate, but he would rather do that instead death... An 
Old enemie was in that planet and he liked kill him so he had beg 
mercy to SwichBlade... By now. So he did all things that Firestrike 
said "I beg, Lord Swichblade "said dificulty Perceptor "That save my 
life in order to serve you... all my life... and help you to beat 
your enemies..."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers@t... wrote:

claws
